job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: Data Scientist, Machine Learning  Sunnyvale  The Merchant Data Science team researches and develops algorithms that power our core areas like pricing, assortment optimization, replenishment, store layout, etc. We work at enormous scale (millions of items x thousands of stores x dozens of variations) to deliver great products at great prices to our customers.  You will be working closely with other data scientists, machine learning engineers, operations research scientists, data engineers within the team as well collaborate with product managers, software engineers and analysts from partner teams to deliver data products that aim to simplify and streamline our store operations. We work with various techniques from machine learning (classical machine learning, deep learning, reinforcement learning), operations research, causal inference and statistics. Our work has been published in top tier conferences such as KDD and INFORMS.  What we are looking for Nice to have but not required The above information has been designed to indicate the general nature and level of work performed in the role.  It is not designed to contain or be interpreted as a comprehensive inventory of all duties, responsibilities and qualifications required of employees assigned to this job. The full Job Description can be made available as part of the hiring process. Option 1: Bachelors degree in Statistics, Economics, Analytics, Mathematics, Computer Science, Information Technology or related field and 2  years' experience in an analytics or related field. Option 2: Masters degree in Statistics, Economics, Analytics, Mathematics, Computer Science,  Information Technology or related field. Option 3: 4 years' experience in an analytics or related field. Preferred Qualifications... Data science, machine learning, optimization models, Master’s degree in Machine Learning, Computer Science, Information Technology, Operations Research, Statistics, Applied Mathematics, Econometrics, Successful completion of one or more assessments in Python, Spark, Scala, or R, Using open source frameworks (for example, scikit learn, tensorflow, torch) Primary Location...840 W CALIFORNIA AVE, SUNNYVALE, CA 94086-4828, United States of America
